definition: ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)

sentences.english: When the iris is inflamed, it is likely that the ciliary body and choroid are involved too.
sentences.chinese: 当虹膜是发炎，很可能睫状体和脉络膜都参与过。

sentences.english: Severe alkali burns of the cornea may result in ischemia of the ciliary body.
sentences.chinese: 严重角膜碱烧伤会导致睫状体血供障碍。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the morphological changes of ciliary body detachment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨睫状体剥离的形态学改变。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether there is latency of herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV-1) in the ciliary body of normal human eyes.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究正常人睫状体是否有单纯疱疹病毒Ⅰ型潜伏。

sentences.english: Objective Exploring the treatment effect of corneal staphyloma used with ciliary pars plana sclerostomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨睫状体扁平部造瘘术治疗角膜葡萄肿的效果。

sentences.english: The iris is fixed to the ciliary body.

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
anterior chamber (the front chamber of the eye)
